text:
Dosis
PENGGUNAAN OBAT INI HARUS SESUAI DENGAN PETUNJUK DOKTER. Dewasa & anak > 12 tahun: 2 kali per hari, 1 Taplet. Dosis maksimal : 3 kali per hari 1 Tablet.
Aturan Pakai
Sebaiknya diberikan bersama makanan.
Perhatian
HARUS DENGAN RESEP DOKTER. Penderita dengan defisiensi asam folat. Penderita dengan status gizi buruk. Penderita defisiensi enzim G6PD. Manula dan Penderita gangguan fungsi ginjal.
Kontra Indikasi
Gangguan fungsi hati dan ginjal yang berat, hipersensitif terhadap sulfonamid. Diskrasia darah. Hamil dan laktasi, bayi < 2 bulan. Profiria
Efek Samping
Gangguan pencernaan misalnya mual, muntah dan diare. Sindroma Steven-Johnson dan Lyell,
Golongan Produk
Obat Keras (Merah)
Kemasan
Dus, 10 Strip @ 10 Kaptab
Manufaktur
Sanbe Farma
No. Registrasi
BPOM: DKL8322200804A1
Site Map
trans:
Dose
USAGE OF THIS DRUG SHOULD FOLLOW DOCTOR'S INSTRUCTION. Adult & children over 12 years old: 2 times a day, 1 Tablet. Maximum dose : 3 times a day 1 Tablet.
How to Use
Should be taken with food.
Caution
REQUIRES A DOCTOR'S PRESCRIPTION. Patient with folic acid deficiency. Patient with malnutrition. Patient with G6PD enzyme deficiency. Elders and Patient with chronic kidney disease.
Contraindication
Chronic liver and kidney disease, hypersensitive to sulfonamides. Blood dyscrasia. Pregnant and lactation, babies under 2 months. Porphyria
Adverse Effect
Indigestion such as nauseous, vomiting and diarrhea. Stevens-Johnson and Lyell syndrome,
Product Class
Hard Drug (Red)
Package
Carton, 10 Strips @ 10 Capsules
Manufacturer
Sanbe Farma
Registration No.
FDA: DKL8322200804A1
Site Map
